\caption{Relative (w.r.t REF2) survey speeds for the different layouts, calculated using the FOV (using PAF FOV for SKASUR) values given in the SRD \cite{srd} and the values in table \ref{tab:snr10-astrobio}. These values are generated at 8, 12 and 13.8GHz for angular scales \{0.04-0.05, 0.05-0.1, 0.1-1, 1-12\} arcsec and are labelled {\it resbin} \{1, 2, 3, 4\} respectively at declinations -10, -30 and -50 degrees.
